name: Bluetonium:Meltdown
description:
Can you beat all 30 Rooms and escape the Reactor?

Rules & Objective:

Place objects on specific tiles to open the door and get to the next room. Be careful! Don't get too close to Nuclear Waste Barrels. You should also avoid Bluetonium, which is a very unstable and reactive element. If you bring the two close to each other, you will trigger a Bluetonium Meltdown reaction, causing the Bluetonium to decay into Verdine, which can then be pushed around safely. The reaction is so powerful that it destroys nearby Waste Barrels and pushes otherwise immovable one-tile objects (like steel crates) away, even diagonally.

Content:

This box-pushing puzzle game contains 30 hand-crafted levels, some are easy, some very challenging. Your progress will be saved after completing a level, so you can always select individual levels to continue playing later on.

Controls:

Use WASD / Arrow keys to move around and press R to restart a level.

Release sale will end after 48h!
